patches.name: Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch
patches.desc: Fixes hundreds of gameplay, quest, NPC, object, item, text, and placement bugs.

patches.name: OneTweak
patches.desc: One mod that includes several different mods: [Borderless Window](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36177), [Double Cursor Fix](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36125), and [ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526).

patches.name: Skyrim Shadow Striping Fix
patches.desc: Adjusts interior light sources that cause the shadow striping effect. Does not conflict with lighting mods.

patches.name: Fuz Ro D-oh - Silent Voice
patches.desc: Enhances support for unvoiced in-game dialog by playing a generic silent voice and lip synch file whenever a dialog response doesn't include voice.

patches.name: Unlimited Bookshelves
patches.desc: Allows more books/items per shelf.

patches.name: Thieves Guild Requirements - No Auto Quest Start Brynjolf
patches.desc: Brynjolf will not approach you and the Thieves Guild quest will not activate if you're not a thief - must have stolen items, picked pockets, and have some skill in sneak.

patches.name: The Paarthurnax Dilemma
patches.desc: Without giving anything away, this basically gives you a very important choice where before you had none. You want this mod.

patches.name: Sell Unusual Gems - Stones of Barenziah
patches.desc: Lets you sell unusual gems to a Khajiit trader (removes "No Stone Unturned" quest from journal)

patches.name: Fast travel timescale fix
patches.desc: Fast traveling to a nearby location takes the equivalent time of walking (instead of 1-2 hours).

patches.name: Weapons and Armor Fixes - Remade
patches.desc: Fixes many bugs and inconsistencies beyond those fixed by USLEP.

patches.name: Clothing and Clutter Fixes
patches.desc: Fixes inconsistencies in clothing, jewelry, and other items - fixes weights, pricing, allows circlets to be worn with hoods, makes jewelry visible when worn and more.

patches.name: LeanWolf's Better-Shaped Weapons
patches.desc: Fixes meshes for Vanilla weapons so they look less like weapons from WoW and more like actual swords. Compatible with [Immersive Weapons](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/) and any texture mods.

patches.name: SkyFalls and SkyMills
patches.desc: Makes distant waterfalls and windmills animated (the static distant waterfalls are especially noticeable). Compatible with [WATER](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/), [Pure Waters](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/) and [Windmills Resized](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30026//).

patches.name: Windmills Resized
patches.desc: Makes the blades of the windmills larger/more realistic in size.

patches.name: Blacksmithforge water fix
patches.desc: Replaces the fake static water at the blacksmith forges with real water.

patches.name: Ethereal Elven Overhaul
patches.desc: Fixes the facial structure of all elves in game - makes them look more like elves instead of goblins. ([DLC Patches](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46067), [SkyRe Patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29185))

patches.name: Height Adjusted Races with True Giants
patches.desc: Changes the height of all races and some creatures (with gender differences).

patches.name: Skyrim Sizes
patches.desc: Realistically increases differences in height between genders and races for Player and NPCs.

patches.name: Gender & Race Heights
patches.desc: Gives more variety in height between races and genders with males generally taller than females.

patches.name: Consistent Older People
patches.desc: Makes NPCs with old faces have matching old bodies. Compatible with any body replacer mod, male or female.

patches.name: New Thinner Torch
patches.desc: Character holds torch more realistically (changes mesh).

ui.name: SkyUI
ui.desc: An essential interface mod that displays the inventory, magic and other menus in a detailed table format, and provides the Mod Configuration Menu used by most other mods.

ui.name: Immersive HUD - iHUD
ui.desc: Hides pieces of the interface until needed to increase immersion. Highly configrable - control what is hidden or visible, when they appear, and how transparent.

ui.name: A Matter of Time - A HUD clock widget
ui.desc: Displays current game time in HUD. Choose style, location, transparency, etc. Highly configurable.

ui.name: Auto-save and time
ui.desc: Displays a ton of information with one small, unobtrusive widget - current game time, current real-life time, hunger, thirst, sleep, etc. Adds real-world alarm clock, immersive game time notifications, immersive wait, dynamic timescale that varies by situation (configurable).

ui.name: Extended UI
ui.desc: Greatly improves the skills menu. Can also extend sleep/wait time up to 30 days.

ui.name: MoreHUD
ui.desc: Shows useful information when hovering over lootable objects, such as carry weight, is it better than equipped gear, known ingredient effects, enchantments, and more.

ui.name: Take Notes - Journal of the Dragonborn
ui.desc: Adds a new player journal to the game which lets you create, view and export your own journal entries.

ui.name: iActivate
ui.desc: Hides keypress hint and (optionally) the action text when viewing an interactive item.

ui.name: Less Intrusive HUD II
ui.desc: Lets you move, rotate, resize, hide and/or adjust the transparency of every interface element.

ui.name: No Boring Sleep-Wait Menu
ui.desc: Rest/wait without interruptions for up to 31 days.

ui.name: iWASM - Immersive Wait And Sleep Menu
ui.desc: Improves the waiting interface. Can also extend sleep/wait time.

ui.name: Categorized Favorites Menu
ui.desc: An alternative to the SkyUI favorites menu that uses the entire screen to show all of your favorited items by category.

ui.name: Categorized Favorites Menu Oni Edition
ui.desc: Makes dozens of mods compatible with [Categorized Favorites Menu](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4862)

ui.name: Categorized Favorites Menu
ui.desc: Renames items so they sort properly (e.g. Arrow-Type, Ore-Type, Ingot-Type).

ui.name: EZ2C Dialogue Menu - configurable
ui.desc: Improves dialog menu interface (easier navigation, better keyboard and mouse control) plus 35 in-game menu customization options (e.g. font, colors, position, brightness, etc)

ui.name: Better Dialogue Controls
ui.desc: Fixes keyboard controls for dialog menus - Prevents selecting wrong item with "E" key because mouse pointer took focus away from the keyboard-selected item. When scrolling choices with mouse wheel, the center item is always the active one.

ui.name: Better MessageBox Controls
ui.desc: Lets you navigate and select popup message boxes with the keyboard. Also makes dialog options easier to select with the mouse by making clickable areas larger.

ui.name: Jaxonz Utilities
ui.desc: A suite of convenient and useful utilities - reposition any static game object, rename anyone or anything, name your save games, mark any person, place or thing and see it on the map, auto looting, and more.

ui.name: Enhanced Camera
ui.desc: A newer, simpler alternative to Immersive First Person View. Lets you see your body in 1st person mode. Allows 3rd person moments such as riding a horse, sitting, crafting, etc. to be viewed in 1st person (MCM configurable)

ui.name: Immersive First Person View
ui.desc: Enables a true first person perspective when riding a horse, in werewolf form, fighting, etc. Highly configurable.

ui.name: The Joy of Perspective - Real 1st Person View
ui.desc: Makes the character visible in 1st person view.

ui.name: Face to face conversation
ui.desc: Lets you configure camera behavior when talking to someone e.g. make camera zoom in closer like Oblivion did.

ui.name: Customizable Camera
ui.desc: Lets you modify the camera in almost any way you want via MCM i.e. center camera, don't change zoom when drawing weapon, etc.

ui.name: Distant Vanity Camera
ui.desc: A simple tweak to Skyrim.ini that allows you to zoom WAAAAY out and view the game from a Diablo-type perspective.

ui.name: SkyVoice - Voice Control for Skyrim
ui.desc: Use your voice (microphone) to execute dragon shouts.

ui.name: Shouts in the Dragon Tongue - Complete
ui.desc: View shouts in the Dragon Language with or without English translation. Several display options and combinations available.

ui.name: Unique Region Names
ui.desc: Displays name of the nine holds instead of "Skyrim".

ui.name: Even Better Quest Objectives
ui.desc: Enhances the quest descriptions in the vanilla game so that you have a clear sense of where you are supposed to go and what you are supposed to do.

ui.name: Immersive Questing
ui.desc: Removes quest markers and map markers for major vanilla quests and objectives and adds detailed directions in the quest description so markers are not needed.

ui.name: The Choice is Yours - Fewer Forced Quests - More Options
ui.desc: Quests are no longer added automatically when talking to an NPC. Quest are only added if you agree to help them.

ui.name: Timing is Everything - Quest Delay and Timing Control
ui.desc: Lets you delay when you want various quest lines to trigger. Helps to prevent so many DLC quest lines from being activated at the start of a new game.

ui.name: Quest Eraser -- Remove Quest Objectives from Your Journal
ui.desc: Lets you remove quests from your journal.

ui.name: KenMOD - Time on loading screen
ui.desc: Displays current computer time on loading screens.

ui.name: immersiveUI_LockpickPlus
ui.desc: Removes interface messages - disables Steal Horse, Pickpocket, Unlock, Steal, Activate, Use, Open, Search, Locked, Sit, Talk, Take, Harvest, etc.

ui.name: Simple Lockpicking
ui.desc: Removes unnecessary gameplay information clutter from the lockpicking screen.

ui.name: YOT - Your Own Thoughts
ui.desc: Changes messages to a first-person point of view. (A newer alternative to 'Think to Yourself Messages' that includes DLC and Frostfall support).

ui.name: Think to Yourself Messages
ui.desc: Changes messages to a first-person point of view. (Does not change messages in DLCs)

ui.name: Khajiit Speak - Complete Dialogue Overhaul
ui.desc: For people playing as a Khajiit, it makes player dialogue sound more like a Khajiit.

ui.name: Changed syntaxes
ui.desc: Changes 3 syntaxes in the game: "Open" [place] is now "Enter" [place], "Search" [container] is now "Loot" [container] and "Talk" [person] is now "Speak with" [person].

ui.name: No Psychic Lock Knowledge
ui.desc: Removes the visual tag on locks that indicate whether the lock is apprentice, adept, master, etc.

ui.name: No empty tag on empty containers
ui.desc: Removes the visual tag that says "empty" on empty containers.

ui.name: Remove repeating OverEncumbered message
ui.desc: Removes the repeating "You are carrying too much to be able to run" message.

ui.name: Death Cam Duration Options
ui.desc: Game will keep running after the player dies until pressing "escape" key.

ui.name: Lore-Based Loading Screens
ui.desc: Adds 160 lore-based quotes as loading screens.

ui.name: No Menu and Loading Smoke
ui.desc: Removes smoke from menu and loading screen (The smoke can cause issues when using an ENB). Simply replaces smoke FX file with a blank FX file.

ui.name: HiAlgoBoost GPU Upgrade
ui.desc: Significantly increases framerate by dynamically reducing the number of pixels rendered at certain times.

ui_map.name: Warburgs Detailed Paper World Map
ui_map.desc: Replaces zoomable map with a more realistic and immersive paper-styled map.

ui_map.name: A Quality World Map - With Roads
ui_map.desc: Adds roads to map and improves map quality.

ui_map.name: World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders
ui_map.desc: Same as "[A Quality World Map - With Roads](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4929)" but it adds the borders to each hold.

ui_map.name: Equip-able Maps
ui_map.desc: For hardcore immersion players - Adds craft-able maps (Skyrim, Solstheim, Treasure Maps, etc.) that can be equipped like a shield. Use block to bring the map up and look at it more closely.

ui_map.name: EzEs -Colored Map Markers-
ui_map.desc: Map markers are colored by type.

ui_map.name: Not Another Colored Map Icon Mod - NACMIM
ui_map.desc: Changes the icons on your map to colored versions (several versions available). Compatible with all DLCs.

ui_map.name: Colored Map Markers Updated
ui_map.desc: An updated version of "[Colored Map Markers](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1327)". Makes all quest targets green, all discovered towns blue and all undiscovered towns red. Everything else is untouched.

ui_map.name: World Map Min_Max Height Pitch Tweak
ui_map.desc: Lets you zoom way in and way out. Lets you set the default pitch angle of the map camera. Lets you turn cloud cover off.

ui_map.name: Remove 3D Map Camera Limits
ui_map.desc: Makes it possible to almost zoom into the ground and removes border limits when panning.

ui_map.name: Follower Map Markers
ui_map.desc: Adds map markers to any follower that you wish. The markers act just like quest markers.

ui_map.name: CS Tag and Track NPCs
ui_map.desc: Tag up to 40 NPCs and track their location through the Quest menu.

ui_map.name: Map Hud Enhanced
ui_map.desc: Makes map markers smaller. Immersive full screen. Compatible with all map mods.

ui_map.name: Dungeon Quest Awareness
ui_map.desc: Changes the map markers and area location of dungeons that contain major quest so you don't start them too early.

ui_map.name: World Map (PNG)
ui_map.desc: A world map in PNG format by GameBanshee.com

ui_map.name: Atlas Map Markers
ui_map.desc: Adds over 700 map markers (including markers for Dawnguard & Dragonborn) to help find treasure maps, shrines, dragon mounds, campsites, skill books and more. Locations can be displayed as Default, Undiscovered, Discovered or they can be Removed.

ui_map.name: The Cartographers Map Markers
ui_map.desc: Adds map markers to many inner city locations such as Player homes, Inns, Stores and Jarls Houses plus it adds many points of interest outside the cities that were discovered during gameplay e.g. Shrines, Temples, Camps, Mines, Ruins, etc.

ui_map.name: Mapseller
ui_map.desc: Adds a cartographer selling maps of the territories showing nearly every map marker in that territory.

ui_map.name: Player Home Map Markers
ui_map.desc: Adds map markers to the front door of the 6 player homes: Whiterun, Windhelm, Markarth, College of Winterhold, Solitude, and Riften.

ui_map.name: Mines of Skyrim
ui_map.desc: Adds a book to leveled lists that contains the locations of all mines and their ore.

ui_map.name: Detailed Mine Map Markers
ui_map.desc: Adds and labels all Mine Map Markers to display the main material it yields.

ui_timesavers.name: Vendor Sale Delay - GONE
ui_timesavers.desc: Vendor's inventory opens immediately after clicking "What have you got for sale?" instead of waiting until after the dialogue has finished.

ui_timesavers.name: SKSE -Elys- AltF4
ui_timesavers.desc: Lets you press ALT+F4 to instantly exit game AND lets you use the volume and mute controls on your keyboard in-game.

ui_timesavers.name: AH Hotkeys - Skyrim Hotkey Manager
ui_timesavers.desc: A more current and less-complicated hotkey manager than More Hotkeys Please.

ui_timesavers.name: Hotkey your Gear
ui_timesavers.desc: Lets you easily save weapon & armor sets for both you and your companions and then easily switch between them.

ui_timesavers.name: Jaxonz Outfitter
ui_timesavers.desc: Use hotkeys to switch between saved equipment sets.

ui_timesavers.name: Auto Unequip Ammo
ui_timesavers.desc: Quiver is automatically unequipped when bow or crossbow is unequipped.

ui_timesavers.name: Auto Unequip Shield
ui_timesavers.desc: Automatically equips/unequips any shield when weapon is drawn/sheathed.

ui_timesavers.name: Auto Unequip Helmet
ui_timesavers.desc: Automatically equips/unequips helmet when you draw/sheathe your weapon or spell.

ui_timesavers.name: Helmet Toggle - Show Hide
ui_timesavers.desc: Adds 2 spells that toggle the player or target's helmet to be hidden or shown.

ui_timesavers.name: Functional Homes
ui_timesavers.desc: Adds all crafting stations inside player homes + 40 linked storage containers (i.e. access same inventory from any home). Auto store and auto sort your crafting supplies by pushing one button.

ui_timesavers.name: Automatic Item Storage
ui_timesavers.desc: Adds 2 new storage cupboards to each buyable home that automatically store your items for you. Adds 1 knapsack that stores your soul gems next to each enchanting table.

ui_timesavers.name: Alchemy Ingredient Storage
ui_timesavers.desc: Adds a special alchemy satchel to every buyable house in Skyrim that, when activated, allows you to transfer all the potion ingredients you currently have on you into it.

ui_timesavers.name: Jonte's Better Alchemy Satchel
ui_timesavers.desc: Puts all of your alchemy ingredients into your satchel with one mouse click.

ui_timesavers.name: Swift Potion Reborn
ui_timesavers.desc: Drink potions automatically depending on configurable settings (i.e. at 30% health). Adds a potion delay (configurable) to prevent spamming and adds potion hotkeys.

ui_timesavers.name: Kace Auto Loot
ui_timesavers.desc: Take loot from dead enemies automatically. Highly configurable.

ui_timesavers.name: AutoSave Manager
ui_timesavers.desc: Creates automatic saves for you based on certain events, conditions, timed intervals or manually. Highly configurable through MCM.

ui_information.name: Guess the Distance - Perceptive Scouting
ui_information.desc: Use "Guess Distance" power to perceive opponent's distance, experience, aggression level, armor, race and weapon (configurable). Amount of information depends on distance and visibility.

ui_information.name: BorderSense
ui_information.desc: Your character will note when crossing the border into a new hold and (optional) remark if you have a bounty in that hold.

ui_information.name: Hold Border Banners
ui_information.desc: Adds banners along roadsides at the boundaries of two holds.

ui_information.name: Improved Container Names
ui_information.desc: Makes container names more informative - "sack" becomes "sack of produce".

ui_information.name: BLESSINGS - Altar Descriptions
ui_information.desc: Improves descriptions of the altars of the nine Gods - "Activate Shrine of Mara" becomes "Activate Shrine of Mara (Fortify Restoration)"

ui_information.name: Soul Gems Differ - Full and Empty
ui_information.desc: Makes soul gems look different depending on whether they have soul gems in them or not.

ui_information.name: Better Skill and Quest Books Names
ui_information.desc: Renames books to show the skills associated with them at the beginning of the name.

ui_information.name: Improved Skill Books
ui_information.desc: Renames books to show the skills associated with them at the end of the name.

ui_information.name: Improved Quest Books
ui_information.desc: Appends "(Quest)" to the names of books that start quests

ui_information.name: Unread Books Glow
ui_information.desc: Unread books will glow - Adjustable brightness (bright, medium, dim)

ui_information.name: Organized Books
ui_information.desc: Edits names of books to more clearly denote books in a series e.g. changes "The Wolf Queen, v4" to "Wolf Queen, Vol. 4 of 8". Also fixes recipes, spell tomes, treasure maps, journals and notes.

ui_information.name: Linguists of Skyrim - Dragon Translation kit
ui_information.desc: Adds a stone tablet deciphering the dragon alphabet and 5 books in Hrothgar containing all known words in the Dragon language. Use them to manually translate the stories on the Word Walls, the names of dragon priests and other draugr.

ui_information.name: Dragon Language Book
ui_information.desc: Adds a book at High Hrothgar explaining the Dragon language. Over 20 pages of instruction and reference.

ui_information.name: Race Description Info
ui_information.desc: Adds more information to the race choice menu.

ui_information.name: Point The Way
ui_information.desc: Places additional road signs at several major intersections to make destination options more clear.

ui_information.name: HiRes Legible Road Signs
ui_information.desc: Makes road signs more legible.

ui_information.name: Real Days and Months
ui_information.desc: Uses actual day, month and times to sleep/wait menu e.g. Time Wait screen will say "Monday, 8:00 AM, 17th of August".

ui_information.name: Blitz Console Commands - MCM
ui_information.desc: Adds an option under Help called "Console Commands" to the in-game pause menu. Lets you browse the list of all console command and their descriptions in-game.

ui_information.name: Console Books
ui_information.desc: Adds about 45 books to the game that include all the items ID for all the items in the game.

ui_information.name: Skyrim Performance Monitor
ui_information.desc: Displays Memory Usage and FPS (Frames per Second) information on the top right corner of your screen. Lets you view a graph of performance metrics from game session.

ui_information.name: Skyrim -Elys- MemInfo
ui_information.desc: Displays Memory Usage, FPS (Frames per Second) and other information on the top left corner of your screen.

ui_information.name: STATUS
ui_information.desc: Displays a variety of game detail information in SkyUI i.e. coordinates, Health, Magicka & Stamina regen rates, speed and damage multipliers, etc.

ui_sounds.name: Sounds of Skyrim - The Wilds
ui_sounds.desc: Adds over 100 new sound effects to the wilderness. Animal, bird and insect sounds play according to weather, time of day and region. Adds rain impact sounds on tents and wooden structures, rustling bushes to simulate small animals scattering on approach and more.

ui_sounds.name: Sounds of Skyrim - Civilization
ui_sounds.desc: Adds over 200 new sound effects to cities, villages, farms, etc. The infamous bloat bug is now fixed!

ui_sounds.name: Sounds of Skyrim - The Dungeons
ui_sounds.desc: Adds over 100 new sound effects to dungeons. Different sound sets for different types of dungeons. Adds exterior weather sounds to the dungeon entrance.

ui_sounds.name: Audio Overhaul for Skyrim
ui_sounds.desc: Tweaks distance and volume, major improvements to footsteps and destruction magic sounds. Improves traps, creatures, weapons, ambience and more. Adds environment-based reverb.

ui_sounds.name: Immersive Sounds Compendium
ui_sounds.desc: A comprehensive sound overhaul. During install, select your choice of sounds for weaponry, magic footsteps, and misc. Multiple options for many sounds. Author recommends using with [Audio Overhaul for Skyrim](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43773).

ui_sounds.name: More Sound Options
ui_sounds.desc: Adds volume controls for vanilla sounds - NPC footsteps, Menu sounds, waterfalls, Weapon draw sounds, etc. Useful for increasing the sound of waterfalls and distant loud noises such as hammering.

ui_sounds.name: Quiet Dungeons
ui_sounds.desc: Removes looping wind noise from dungeons.

ui_sounds.name: Icebreakers Improved Reverb
ui_sounds.desc: Adds reverb to caverns.

ui_sounds.name: Activate Fail Noise Removal
ui_sounds.desc: Removes annoying "fail" noise.

ui_sounds.name: SILENT Skyrim - Quieter Interface
ui_sounds.desc: Can replace nearly 2 dozen annoying sound effects with silent .wav file - sneak attack "clunk", activate fail noise, level-up noises, crafting noises, nirn root ringing, and many more.

ui_sounds.name: Skyrim User Interface Silencer
ui_sounds.desc: Same as above mod, but uses a different method of choosing which sounds to removes.

ui_sounds.name: Waterbreathing Breathless Emerge
ui_sounds.desc: Water emerging breath sound no longer plays if under the effect of water breathing.

ui_sounds.name: Underwater Swimming SFX Fix
ui_sounds.desc: Corrects/improves underwater sound for better immersion.

ui_sounds.name: Realistic Husky Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Adds over 60 all-new, high-quality husky sounds to the Dawnguard huskies.

ui_sounds.name: Better Horse Pain Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Much better sound for horses that get hit/hurt.

ui_sounds.name: FSS - Better Bards
ui_sounds.desc: Improves timing of bard singing.

ui_sounds.name: FSS - No pause between lines
ui_sounds.desc: Removes pause between spoken NPC lines.

ui_sounds.name: Bards Play Less - Bards Play Only on flagsuest
ui_sounds.desc: Choose between 3 versions - 1) Bards Play Less (Talking to them will force them to take a break) break 2) Bards Play Less instrumental only 3) Bards play only on flagsuest (linked video is not related to this mod).

ui_sounds.name: Thundering shouts
ui_sounds.desc: Cooler shouts - Adds some echo to shouts + a thunder sound + 10% lower pitch.

ui_sounds.name: Ambient Seagulls
ui_sounds.desc: Adds seagull noises to appropriate areas.

ui_sounds.name: Better Animal Footsteps
ui_sounds.desc: Makes footstep sounds for 16+ animals more realistic (e.g. rabbits, spiders, mammoths, horkers, mudcrabs, deer, bear, etc.).

ui_sounds.name: IHSS - Improved Horse Step Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Improves the "hoovestep" sounds of horses by adding "sound sets" for different grounds.

ui_sounds.name: Clanking Armor
ui_sounds.desc: Changes the footstep sounds when wearing plate armor (much more realistic!).

ui_sounds.name: Ultra Realistic Bow Shoot Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Makes bow sounds more realistic.

ui_sounds.name: Improved Combat Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Improves combat sounds.

ui_sounds.name: Better Weapon Swing Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Improves weapon swing sounds.

ui_sounds.name: Smooth blade draw and Sheathe
ui_sounds.desc: Quieter sound when drawing or sheathing a blade. When in sneak mode, your character will attack silently instead of yelling with each swing plus weapon sounds are quieter.

ui_sounds.name: Dagger Sounds 4 Daggers
ui_sounds.desc: Exchanges the 1h swing sounds of daggers with special dagger swing sounds.

ui_sounds.name: Delarics Conditional Combat Music
ui_sounds.desc: Disables combat music except when fighting certain higher-level enemies (several lists to choose from). No more being tipped off when common enemies are nearby.

ui_sounds.name: Fix for combat music
ui_sounds.desc: Ensures that combat music always plays during battles. (By default, low-level encounters stop triggering combat music when player reaches higher levels)

ui_sounds.name: True Medieval Music
ui_sounds.desc: Replaces vanilla music you hear in bars/s with true medieval music from long ago.

ui_sounds.name: Immersive Music
ui_sounds.desc: Adds 18 hours of lore-friendly music to the existing 3.5 hours of vanilla music. Hand-selected by Hothtrooper44. Appropriate music type will play based on location/activity.

ui_sounds.name: Fantasy Soundtrack Project
ui_sounds.desc: The successor to Fantasy Music Overhaul. Includes 200+ lore-friendly music tracks (12+ hours) that can add to or replace the original Skyrim soundtrack. Appropriate music plays based on location/activity.

ui_sounds.name: Enhanced Soundtrack
ui_sounds.desc: Adds a variety of high quality, immersive ambient music to game.

ui_sounds.name: Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion
ui_sounds.desc: Adds 30 minutes of lore-friendly orchestral music to world exploration playlist.

ui_sounds.name: Skyrim Theme Menu Music
ui_sounds.desc: Violin cover of Skyrim theme music???.by Jason Yang

ui_animations.name: No Spinning Death Animation
ui_animations.desc: Removes the unrealistic spinning death animation. Ragdoll physics used instead. Will not affect killmoves.

ui_animations.name: No heavy muscular walk and idle
ui_animations.desc: Makes NPCs and character stand and walk normally instead of appearing overly musclebound.

ui_animations.name: Run Sprint and Jump
ui_animations.desc: Improves animations for run, sprint and jump (males and females).

ui_animations.name: Bowlegged jump animation Fix
ui_animations.desc: Fixes the bowlegged jump animations for both males and females.

ui_animations.name: Sprint and Jump with MCM
ui_animations.desc: Lets you jump while sprinting.

ui_animations.name: Dragon Animation Replace
ui_animations.desc: Dragons raise their head higher while on the ground and adds animations for attacks like dragon shout and tail slam.

ui_animations.name: Faster GET UP STAND UP animation
ui_animations.desc: Edits the stand up animation to be twice as fast while maintaining realism.

ui_animations.name: Dovahkiin Relaxes Too
ui_animations.desc: Use one shout to activate an animation appropriate for the object you cast it upon e.g. 'sit', 'sleep', 'warm hands by fire', 'sit and eat/drink' 'pray', 'lean on wall/counter', 'feed chicken', etc.

ui_animations.name: Simple Actions
ui_animations.desc: Let the player perform a few simple actions anywhere: sit anywhere, meditate anywhere and sleep anywhere (with actual sleep menu).

ui_animations.name: AE Animation
ui_animations.desc: Adds 24 shouts that each play a specific animation.

ui_animations.name: Passtime
ui_animations.desc: Lightweight, scripted mod that allows you to perform idle animations at the press of a key. No spells, no activator items, no quests, just key presses.

ui_animations.name: Sit Anywhere
ui_animations.desc: Allows you or you followers to sit anywhere. Adds 4 lesser powers to 'sit cross-legged', 'sit on a ledge', 'create a cross-legged sitting spot' or 'create a ledge sitting spot'

ui_animations.name: Dovahkiin Prayers
ui_animations.desc: Adds a meditate animation when activating a shrine.

ui_animations.name: Pray at Shrines
ui_animations.desc: Automatically plays a short praying animation when praying at a shrine.

ui_animations.name: 360 Walk and Run Plus
ui_animations.desc: Lets your character walk in a 360-degree circle while in 3rd person with weapon sheathed i.e. character can now walk toward you instead of back stepping.

ui_animations.name: Animations
ui_animations.desc: Adds animations for looting containers and corpses, harvesting plants, lockpicking doors and chests, opening doors, activating levers, praying, drinking and eating potions and food, equipping armor and opening map.

ui_animations.name: Immersive Animations
ui_animations.desc: Improves several 3rd person animations giving player a more relaxed stance when wielding weapons.

ui_animations.name: Enhanced Animation
ui_animations.desc: Adds 3 directional attacks for left-handed attacks, improved swimming animation, and modifies 200+ other animations including walking/running/sneaking & power attack animations. Player can choose which ones to install.

ui_animations.name: Dual Wield Improved Animation
ui_animations.desc: Improves dual wield animations for idle, turning, running, normal attack and power attack. Makes movements more fluid.

ui_animations.name: YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight
ui_animations.desc: Replaces one-handed sword and magic animations. Designed to fit a character with a sword in one hand and magic in the other.

ui_animations.name: New Animation for Magic Casting
ui_animations.desc: Improves animations for casting magic. Note: It is safe, per the author, to delete any animation file that you don't like.

ui_animations.name: 3rd Person Animation Tweak - Dual Wield Sprint
ui_animations.desc: A much more realistic Dual Wield Sprinting animation.

ui_animations.name: 3rd Person Dual Wield Animation Fix
ui_animations.desc: Improves the 3rd person idle turn and sprint animation while dual wielding weapons.

ui_animations.name: Running with your Bow Replacer
ui_animations.desc: Improves 3 bow animations for RunForward, RunForwardLeft & RunForwardRight.

ui_animations.name: Casual bow animations
ui_animations.desc: Improves 22 bow animations for standing idle, walking, running and turning with a bow.

ui_animations.name: 3rd Person Animation Tweak - Run Forward with Bow
ui_animations.desc: Improves 3 bow animations for RunForward, RunForwardLeft & RunForwardRight.

ui_animations.name: DSAMG - Dragon Soul Absorb More Glorious
ui_animations.desc: Improves music and animation when absorbing a dragon soul.
